name: Following Step

sections.body: When using the Step Up feat to follow an adjacent foe, you may move up to 10 feet. You may still take a 5-foot step during your next turn, and any movement you make using this feat does not subtract any distance from your movement during your next turn.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can only take a 5-foot step to follow an opponent using Step Up.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can repeatedly close the distance when foes try to move away, without impeding your normal movement.
